reviews.review:
게임이 진짜 재밌긴한데 어그로 병11111신 친구들도 많고 일단 정식으로 서비스중인 게임이라고 믿을수 없을만큼 오류가 엄청 많습니다 ^-^ 게임 플레이가 아니라 회사 QA로 무료 노동력을 제공해주는 기분ㅎㅎ
QA(노예)가 오류를 발견해서 제보해줘도 딱히 그걸 고치려는 노력을 안하는건지 노력하지만 고치지 못하는건지 몇달째 고쳐지지 않는 오류도 수두룩뺵빽합니다 ㅎㅎ 만약 세계 최고의 QA가 꿈이시라면 데바데를 해보는것도 추천드려요 ㅎㅎ 다른 오류는 그렇다 치더라도 랭킹제 게임에서 "일부" 유저들의 랭크가 오르지 않고 게임 종료 후 튕기는 오류를 몇달째 고치지 않고 유지중인 이유를 전혀 모르겠네요 ㅎㅎ

Un juego multijugador diferente a otros. Juegan 5 personas  (4 vs 1) . Los sobrevivientes deben trabajar juntos para escapar, mientras el (obviamente) el asesino debe matarlos.
Ideal para jugar entre amigos
игра говно постоянные тунелеры или ген рашеры
กล้วยอร่อยนะ
Fun if you have friends or good teammates -Bad if you have bad teammates... or Troll killers (face camper,camper,lagger.)

嘛，我也是一个2016年就在关注的老牌云玩家，然而2018年我才刚买。不得不说这游戏...提升空间很大，最近一波送稀有道具也让我颇为感动（虽然我有人皇战袍）我还是希望能越来越好
可能有的玩家很屑zzz有时也会zz，但我不会再为他袒护了。除了瞎改就是瞎改，我也算是个双边玩家了，玩人的时候很少单排，但这么多改动只让我觉得越来越难受，真的是只会在毫无用处的地方乱改，比如ui和动作的改动，并没有什么太大的正面效益，还不在平衡上多做改动，sbzzz在给你氪金我是狗

this is a good game. It has lot of ideas in it,maps,killers,survivers,skins,skills and mind games different actions. yet peaple hate it why? well the game is produced by BeHaVeuR they don't have a big team for this amazing game so you are GOING to find a lot, lot of different bugs, but mostly hitbox but they BHVR. tries there best to prevent that with dedacitet servers,hiring more peaple for solutions. After you found out the different bugs of the game , you found out that the player base is odd like not any other games it's...Toxic realy REALY toxic. Peaple are going to be assholes but god bless those who play the game fair and fun for both killer and survivor side.Then you discover the killer button or the survivor so you start playing it but you keep failing and peaple are trashing you so instead of being toxic,playing unfair,unfun watch Otz or Noob3 for tutorials and if you play nice and fair you discover the nicer player base. Wich is realy sweet and warm i ' d like to meet you on my trial . this game needs more players and with friends this is one ot THE best games to play with your friend(s). or you can kill them too your choice ;) So good luck and be the fog with you!

It's a fun game, especially with friends.
The Queue time for killers can be a bit harsh though, let's you spend maybe 5 - 10 minutes just waiting for people sometimes.
It also has a few balance issues but is still all good fun in the end.
